title: Gorgeous fully renovated 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms: $3300
posting_body: The apartment: the unit was thoroughly renovated, down to the studs in 2020 complete with lovely finishes.
Highlights include a well-appointed kitchen with granite countertops, a beautiful open space and stainless-steel appliances; 2 full bathrooms, a back patio and a backyard.
Other features include hardwood floors throughout, recessed lighting, in-unit laundry, and central air-conditioning.
Rooms: the 3  rooms are good sized, they will easily fit a queen, a dresser, night stands, etc.
One of them has its own bathroom.
The picture of the house are from when it was staged, the house will come completely unfurnished.
Laundry: On site (washer and dryer)
Outdoor Space: has an excellent outdoor space with a private deck off the dining area plus shared outdoor yard and patio space
Price: we are renting the whole place for $3300 (plus utilities).
We ask for first and 1 month deposit.
We are not renting the individual rooms, just the whole place.
Pets:  negotiable (depending on size and breed)
About you: this is the perfect place for a family, or a group of young professional who wants to share the apartment.
We are looking for a considerate, polite and respectful humans.
Parking: it's on street and it's super easy to park in front of the house (no permit needed).
Move in date: August 15th (there is some flexibility, so let's chat)
Location: This apartment is located in a very residential street in Roxbury, very close to the Boston Latin academy.
We are close to various bus lines, 10 minutes drive to Northeastern.
Walking distance from Franklin park
Send me an email and tell me a little bit about yourself and who will be living here and we will be scheduling a couple of viewing this upcoming weekend.
